description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Graffiti LIVE brings the fun and creativity of an online art community to your living room!  Paint an image and share it with the world!  Features User Comments and Image Rating systems for interacting with other community members!  Supports automatic image sharing with other users over Xbox LIVE (XBL Gold membership is required)
